comments.comment:
I have a question, Why HMaster extends HRegionServer, it seems there is no relationship between them.....

Due to this, HMaster create two instance, one is created by ServerManager, the other is created by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HRegionServer.createClusterConnection which HMaster inherit

I have a question, Why HMaster extends HRegionServer

Please refer HBASE-10569.

What Ashish Singhi says. In short, the two servers have much in common – Configuration systems, how they start, their RPC, services, their UI, and so on – and having them apart they had deviated (two different ways to start an hbase server).

Can ServerManager make use of the ClusterConnection made by HRS? Thanks Heng Chen Good find.
